name: Fetch Notification Counts using CIF Key

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000932050024000"

When I fetch the Notification Counts for Customer:
| cifKey |
| 0100000932050024000 |

Then the following Notification Counts should be returned
| applicationsCount | pfpCount | sigInfoCount | contactCount | connectionCount | serviceRequestCount | salesContactsCount |
| 0 | 27 | 0 | 53 | 0 | 0 | 37 |

children.description: Validate response: | applicationsCount | pfpCount | sigInfoCount | contactCount | connectionCount | serviceRequestCount | salesContactsCount | | 0 | 27 | 0 | 53 | 0 | 0 | 37 |

userStory.storyName: Fetch the Notification Counts for a customer

title: Fetch Notification Counts using CIF Key

tags.name: Fetch the Notification Counts for a customer
